segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate, it’s almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even notice the water at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what’s so interesting about that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s completely oblivious to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids could be doing anything, and she wouldn’t know.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how unaware she is of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is getting closer to her, and she’s just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s in her own little world right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are going to get away with everything at this rate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she snaps out of it soon before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
